item.title: SQL Overview
item.description: This is a note type post for personal reference. I am learning SQL right now and for the learning purpose, I chose two websites: SQL Course; SQLBolt; For the awesome learning experience, my advice to follow according to your preference. Also, if anyone wants to practice SQL, see Hackerrank’s SQL problem-set. This is still in the early stage. Any suggestions will be appreciated. A relational database system contains one or more objects called tables.
